resources.string: Includes proto buffer in the debug log.
Includes spannable in the debug log.

"When a non-premium user plays a song included in an album, the music video is sometimes played instead of the official song.
Find the official song if a music video is detected playing from an album.
Limitations: Kids videos may not redirected."

"Clicking on the comment panel title ('Comments') scrolls to the top.
Limitations: Does not apply to comment replies."
Enable scroll to top in comments
Displays the optimization dialog for GMSCore at each application startup.
Hides the search button in the toolbar.
"Hide elements of the settings menu. This hides not only the YT Music settings menu, but also the ReVanced Extended settings menu."
Changing default mobile data quality to Auto.
Changing default Wi-Fi quality to Auto.

"This feature is experimental. There are structural limitations of the patch, as Activities such as Search and Settings in YouTube Music are not public.
Known issues: • When a replaced Activity such as Search and Settings is closed, the start page opens.
Click to open the 'Change start page' settings."
Replaces the Samples button with the Search button.
Replaces the Upgrade button with the Settings button.
7.17.52 - Comments section does not appear in home feed

"Spoof the player parameter to prevent playback issues.
Side effect: • Sometimes the subtitles are located at the top of the player instead of the bottom. • This may not work for some users."

If you experience any playback issues, enable one of the following options depending on which works best for you: \"Spoof streaming data\", \"Spoof video streams\" or \"Spoof client\" in Settings > %s > Miscellaneous.
Shows the client used to fetch streaming data in Stats for nerds.

"Spoof the streaming data to prevent playback issues.
• When used with 'Spoof client', playback issues may occur."
Defines a default client for spoofing.

"Spoof the client video streams to prevent playback issues.
Side effect: • App may be forced to close when using a VPN or DNS. • Audio may intermittently stutter during playback on adaptive bitrate streaming clients (All clients other than Android VR 1.43.32)."
